mapper.sql: data_type, use_type, orders, data_name, state, data_mark
mapper.select:
select
from sy_data_type_dic where use_type = #{useType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and state = 'Y'
mapper.insert:
insert into sy_data_type_dic
data_type,
use_type,
orders,
data_name,
state,
data_mark,
#{dataType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{useType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{orders,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dataName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{dataMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update sy_data_type_dic
orders = #{orders,jdbcType=INTEGER},
data_name = #{dataName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR},
data_mark = #{dataMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where data_type = #{dataType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and use_type = #{useType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
